item.title: Justus Bennetts - Bad Day
item.description:
I hope you go broke
and your iPhone breaks
And your ex
shows up
At your next
first date
And your car
gets towed
So you show up late
to your shitty-axx job
Hope you
have a bad day
Remember
when you said
That I’d end up
doin’ nada
And when I was young
my momma must’ve
Dropped me
on my head
But there ain’t
a bxxxx like karma
I guess you two got
that in common and
I don’t wanna
be spiteful but
You someone
I got spite for and
I know it ain’t right
but
All you ever did was
do me wrong
So I hope you go broke
and your iPhone breaks
And your ex
shows up
At your next
first date
And your car
gets towed
So you show up late
to your shitty-axx job
Hope you
have a bad day
Hope you lose
your keys
And you get
locked out
And when things are
lookin’ up
Hope it all
goes south
‘Cause you never
gave a fxxx
When I opened
my mouth
I got nothin’
else to say
Except
have a bad day
You bring out
the worst in me
If you feelin’
like sxxx
Then you deserve
to be
Every friend
I’ve ever had
From my roommate
to my dad
Said to cut you
out my life
Like it was
surgery
I don’t wanna be
spiteful but
You someone
I got spite for and
I know it ain’t right
but
All you ever did was
do me wrong
So I hope you go broke
and your iPhone breaks
And your ex
shows up
At your next
first date
And your car
gets towed
So you show up late
to your shitty-axx job
Hope you
have a bad day
Hope you lose
your keys
And you get
locked out
And when things are
lookin’ up
Hope it all
goes south
‘Cause you never
gave a fxxx
When I opened
my mouth
I got nothin’
else to say
Except
have a bad day
